document_data.name: Maerun Stoutbold
document_data.parents: [[Maerim Stoutbold]] {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211028234155/http://candlekeep.com/downloads/So_Saith_Ed_Part25_%282010-2016%29.zip| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Maerun Stoutbold''' was a merchant in [[Suzail]], [[Cormyr]] around [[1367 DR]]. He ran a shipbuilding company out of both Suzail and [[Marsember]] that dealt in the repair and sale of ships, nets, and masts.
document_data.History: He had not been found to have broken the law but he was well known to be the person to speak to for silent passage on a ship. Although Maerun was caught by a [[War Wizards|War Wizard]] with two bound females, he hired a [[Sembia]]n mage to claim they were creatures [[Polymorph (spell)|polymorphed]] into [[human]] form for safe transportation. Maerun spent his winters in Marsember.
